title: The Dakota Roche Interview: Being a Pro BMX Rider for Almost 20 Years, Spot Searching & More
description:
BMX legend Dakota Roche chop it up with Adam about the glory days of BMX, the longevity of his career, still doing tricks now and more!! https://www.instagram.com/dakroche/
